com.gemalto.idp.mobile.authentication.mode.face

Interface FaceAuthSettings

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    FaceAuthEnrollerSettings, FaceAuthVerifierSettings

    public interface FaceAuthSettings
    This is a generic settings for Face Authentication. Please refer to FaceAuthEnrollerSettings and FaceAuthVerifierSettings
    Since:
    4.2

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  FaceAuthSettings.FaceAuthLivenessMode
      The defined liveness modes.

    • Method Detail

      • setLivenessMode

        void setLivenessMode(FaceAuthSettings.FaceAuthLivenessMode mode)
        Set the liveness mode to be use. For enrollment only FaceAuthSettings.FaceAuthLivenessMode.IMAGE mode is supported. For verification, FaceAuthSettings.FaceAuthLivenessMode.LIVENESS_PASSIVE mode is highly recommended for user verification.
        Parameters:
        mode - mode to use during next biometric face action

      • getLivenessMode

        FaceAuthSettings.FaceAuthLivenessMode getLivenessMode()
        The liveness mode
        Returns:
        the liveness mode

      • setLivenessThreshold

        void setLivenessThreshold(int threshold)
        Set the liveness threshold. This threshold is used in Liveness mode only and determine how long the 'Still phase' will be. The higher threshold the longer 'Still phase'. Default value is 0 so no 'Still phase' will appear. During still phase, it requires high quality of image extraction. The user will be required to hold the camera still and with good lightening.
        Parameters:
        threshold - value between 0 to 100

      • getLivenessThreshold

        int getLivenessThreshold()
        The Liveness threshold.
        Returns:
        the Liveness Threshold.

      • setLivenessBlinkTimeout

        void setLivenessBlinkTimeout(int timeout)
        Blink timeout in milliseconds. Default value is 2000. 'Blink' is required in FaceAuthSettings.FaceAuthLivenessMode.LIVENESS_PASSIVE mode. Liveness action instruction will be given inside the frame event callback. Once 'blink' action is asked by the SDK, if blink action is not detected by the camera within the configured timeout, face extraction will fail.
        Parameters:
        timeout - timeout

      • getLivenessBlinkTimeout

        int getLivenessBlinkTimeout()
        Blink timeout.
        Returns:
        current timeout value

      • setQualityThreshold

        void setQualityThreshold(int threshold)
        Set the quality threshold. If threshold is used during enrollment to determine the quality of a face. If an extracted face quality is less than specified value, face will be rejected. Default value is 50.
        Parameters:
        threshold - value between 0 to 100

      • getQualityThreshold

        int getQualityThreshold()
        The Quality threshold.
        Returns:
        the Quality Threshold.
